page.title: 10A Weekend Day.
page.content:
I woke up at quarter past seven and read a book called Jeremy James.I got up at about twenty past eight and got dressed.I had{breakfast of rice {crispies,bacon and egg,toast and a cup {of tea.}I had a wash and wrote a little bit of this.I got ready to go to{church.}At{church}we sang some {hymns.}Some were good and some were not.I went down to{Sunday school}and learnt about the disciples.I came home and{played football.}I came in and had {dinner}and then went out to sow some seeds and then played football again.Soon it was{tea time}and after that I did something for school and watched football on the{television}and then had a{bath}and went to{bed.
Simon Grant.
